name: .BSV File Extension
summary: Learn about .BSV files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a BSV file with ImBatch (Windows). To do so, select the Folder button that appears in ImBatch's toolbar. Then, navigate to and open your BSV file. The tasks your BSV file contains will appear in ImBatch's task list.
If you do not have access to ImBatch but want to view the task list a BSV file contains, you can open the file in any text editor to view the XML text it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
